---
title: "Fix the plate name"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_notebook: default
params: 
  type: "digest"
  id: "digest_id"
  
---

Access database.
```{r echo = F, message=FALSE}
source("../genomics/scripts/lab_helpers.R")
lab <- write_db("Laboratory")
library(knitr)
```
Find the range of rows to be changed
```{r}
# pull in all table
dat <- dbReadTable(lab, params$type)

change <- dat %>% 
  filter(plate == "D5501-5580") %>% 
  mutate(plate = "D5501-D5580")

dat <- change_rows(dat, change, params$id)
```
